1.0.name: wordpress/posts-to-newsletters
1.0.description: This plugin allows you to easily create newsletters from your posts. You can customize the template of your newsletters to use your logo and custom styles. You can add any number of posts (or custom post types) to each newsletter. You can then optionally create and send MailChimp campaigns directly from WordPress.
